name: Octoma
description:
One day, the Octos were all busy partying, making and playing games for decades-old computers that can barely run them. But when the squids came and saw how much fun the octos were having, they grew jealous, and kidnapped the Octo Princess! Now a brave octo must find the sacred artifacts from the World Above, venture to Castle Daiouika, and defeat the Daiouika Wizard in order to save the Octo Princess! Will that brave octo be you?

Controls (Keyboard):
[On mobile, tap the screen to bring up the VIP keypad]

WASD/Arrow keys [5789]: Move North, West, South, and East respectively.

Q [4]: Skip turn.

1: Attack (You will be asked to input a direction)!

3: Cancel attack. 

Press E [6] to start the game. 

Inspired by Ultima by Lord British. Created for Octojam 8 using Octo.

View on Github
